language.entry: The frost knight of the north, the embodiment of winter, wielding his rune blade and wearing his frost infused armor, the Harbinger can freeze and weaken his enemies or shatter them into oblivion.
No, that would be way too much cold for others to handle!
No, that would be way too much cold for others to handle!
Revenants seem to be afraid of frost, interesting...
Keep that eldritch deity away from me.
I haven't seen a Fury in a long time, let's keep it that way.
I do not travel with gullible knights.
The Harbinger of winter... Don't make me laugh.
He doesn't want to travel with me for some reason.
No way! Harbingers mess with my temperament.
I refuse to travel with this frost born!
The Harbinger is known for his versatility. He is able to swap between three different paths of power that can fortify him, empower him, heal him and even weaken his enemies in many different ways.
Harbinger, the true frost knight of the north, while his nature is quite cold he still fortifies his companions and progressively empowers himself with his own runes.
The winter has come upon us and it's herald is here to help us in this dire need.
As the winds become colder and the sky turns gray, it must only mean the heralds of winter are ascending within the Hamlet.
Winter will not fail us, give it a chance!
Let me take care of your pain.
I can assure you that this will help!
Embrace the chill winds of the north!
You are travelling with a Harbinger, show some courage!
Fight for me! Show me your worth!
Let me give you a lesson.
This will improve your combat efficiency.
I have no interest in such things!
I am not spending my precious time here.
No, please, how can this be ?
I guess I have to do everything myself!
I will turn you all to ice cubes!
Now i will shatter you all!
Time to show you the true power of winter!
There is nothing that can stop me!
Now you feel the winter embrace!
The cold should prevent my emotions!
I refuse to be a coward...
This is what i'm talking about!
Why are you here if you cannot fight?
Should have travelled with a better group...
I wonder what would happen if I wasn't here.
Winter will lead me to victory!
Let's see what they can do to me.
I can't go on much longer...
Our lives are coming to an end...
Winter will win this for us!
Power of frost will consume you all.
Stay back and let me do my job.
I need a moment to focus.
Let me fall back, this fear is strong.
I need some time, i need to move.
No! You will not hit me again!
Moving back, they are going to attack me.
Let's see if their bite is as strong as their bark.
Now this is what i live for.
You don't really need me here, i'm moving back.
I got something on my plate.
I am tired of all of this.
There is no purpose to this curse.
We have to let it go.
Watch me, i will show you how this is done.
They are too powerful, i need to move back.
I am not supposed to be here.
I am not sure what i need to do here.
I don't know what to do!
I'm not listening to any of you!
That would be a very bad move.
Why would i need to do that?
I am the will of the frost!
I am the king of winter!
I know what has to be done!
I know what needs to be done!
We are fools to have come to this place...
I don't want to perish here.
I can hear them near us.
I don't know what to think anymore.
This has been fun so far!
I should have travelled with better companions.
You all need to improve drastically.
Be glad that i'm here to save you.
You are all so lucky to have me.
What would you be without me i wonder.
We need to end our journey.
This will not end well for us.
We need to return to the Hamlet.
I need to rest, leave me be!
I need to cool off a little bit!
I am the frost born of the north!
I am right over here, come at me!
Why go on, i am here, end me if you can!
I am the king of the north!
I already see what will happen.
I am very confused right now.
Damn it, that was not planned!
They are waiting for us, we cannot leave now.
This will be my end, i am not leaving this place.
This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it?
This is what i wanted and now you want me to leave?
We need to end this battle, i am no coward!
I feel fear and i do not know why.
I say when that can happen!
I am no coward, why is this happening to me?
Did you guys hear that? It's an ambush!
Today is probably my worst day.
I am not surprised at all.
Why are you in such a hurry?
What is the meaning of that?
Next time I will attack first.
Embrace the gift of frost for the love of our maker.
So that is what they are doing.
Just move out of the way.
You need to learn how to dodge.
It's time for me to kill them.
I had a feeling that would happen.
I can see them coming for us.
I have no comment on that.
Come on, i'm itching for a fight.
I hope we find something to fight soon.
Stop whining and lets move on.
There has to be another way.
There is no reason to do that...
That won't help us in the coming battle.
Nope, that is not my way.
I will heal when i need to heal.
I don't want to heal right now.
That will not help us win.
Let's just go onward to our doom.
I don't need that right now.
No! The Winter will help me.
I am a frost born i can heal myself.
I know what i need to do and when!
I do not need that at all.
Let me just decide for myself.
You don't know when to quit, don't you?
I know you mean well but i cannot do that right now.
I must say i am quite disappointed.
Anyone can do better than that.
There must always be a Harbinger...
I am very tired from being afraid...
I can feel something near us...
I know they are up to something.
They will end us in our sleep.
We need to fight something soon...
So boring, can we continue our journey.
You all seem very new to all this.
Your best is not good enough.
I wish i could rest a bit.
I am very tireless right now.
Give me a moment to recover some of my strength.
The results will be the same no matter what.
All of this is too much for me.
I feel so tired and scared for no reason.
This is a very confusing situation.
I don't like this plan one bit.
We need to fight more enemies.
Where is a fight when you need one.
No need for that, but alright, i will play along.
Winter will lead us to victory.
The path of frost is always rewarding.
Do we really need to eat now?
I want to fight and not eat.
It can always use a bit more salt.
I wish we had some chicken.
I would love a steak right now.

Zwiastun, mimo swego chodnego usposobienia, podczas obozowania, przy pomocy znakw runicznych, wzmacnia swoich towarzyszy jak i samego siebie.
Zima zawitaa do naszych ziem, a jej Zwiastun docza do nas by pomc nam w naszej fatalnej sytuacji.
Mino wiele czasu od kiedy ostatnio zima odwiedzia nas wraz ze swym wysannikiem. Tymbardziej powinnismy si cieszy na wie i takowy pragnie si do nas przyczy.
